DataElement.preferredName: Ion Semiconductor (Ion Torrent) Gene Sequencing Performed Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An indicator of whether sequencing was performed using an ion semiconductor sequencing (Ion Torrent) platform [manually curated].

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A functional unit of heredity which occupies a specific position on a particular chromosome and serves as the template for a product that contributes to a phenotype or a biological function._Specifies sequence of sort order._Executed and carried through to completion.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition:
A functional unit of heredity which occupies a specific position on a particular chromosome and serves as the template for a product that contributes to a phenotype or a biological function.:

Specifies sequence of sort order.

Concepts.definition: A functional unit of heredity which occupies a specific position on a particular chromosome and serves as the template for a product that contributes to a phenotype or a biological function.
Executed and carried through to completion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: A functional unit of heredity which occupies a specific position (locus) on a particular chromosome, is capable of reproducing itself exactly at each cell division, and directs the formation of a protein or other product. The gene as a functional unit consists of a discrete segment of a giant DNA molecule containing the purine (adenine and guanine) and pyrimidine (cytosine and thymine) bases in the ordered and correct sequence that encodes a specific functional product (i.e., a protein or RNA molecule).

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Needed new  DEC for new CDE "Was sequencing using the ion torrent platforms performed?"; Released during quarterly metrics clean up_12.03.20

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Unknown Not Applicable Indicator
